name: Marvy the Hamster
description:
Our very first game developed in our lives by SFLC 1 ( and 2) for GameCraft 2016.
SFLC 1 Members: Marvin Chin, Alvin Ng, Neil Brian Labayna
SFLC 2 Members: Choo Wen Xin, Ng Tzer Bin
Theme - Close Enough


Marvy the Hamster wants to navigate through space, but is afraid to do so. Try to navigate it through space close enough to the planets without crashing into them to earn points!
Controls:

Q - Turn Left
P - Turn Right
Space - Restart
